topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b74251636872043c0a0600#post_53b74251636872043c0a0600

Horrifying pictures of human gore and animal abuse as far as the eye can see.

It's disgusting, but after Tumblr _actually tried to get 4chan shut down_ (or reeducate them, or some other garbage), I can't really say that they didn't bring this shit upon themselves. Still sucks that a majority of the website has to suffer because a group of morons tried to "educate" that hellhole, though.

They poked a bear with a stick and were shocked when it swiped back.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

Horrifying pictures of human gore and animal abuse as far as the eye can see.

It's disgusting, but after Tumblr _actually tried to get 4chan shut down_ (or reeducate them, or some other garbage), I can't really say that they didn't bring this shit upon themselves. Still sucks that a majority of the website has to suffer because a group of morons tried to "educate" that hellhole, though.

They poked a bear with a stick and were shocked when it swiped back.[/bq]

Some 4chan guy tried to trick Tumblr feminists into taking down Tumblr itself (that's where the IP leads, not 4chan).

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b744c563687242c4d30000#post_53b744c563687242c4d30000

I love how high and mighty the Tumblr users are trying to act during the entire thing; that's the best part.

I've seen at least five posts telling 4chan users to "go get laid". So much for them saying that virginity or your lack of it doesn't matter.
